title: SET_MANUAL_SHUTDOWN_LOADING_SCREEN_NUI
content:
0x1722C938// SetManualShutdownLoadingScreenNui
void SET_MANUAL_SHUTDOWN_LOADING_SCREEN_NUI(BOOL manualShutdown);Parameters:manualShutdown: TRUE to manually shut down the loading screen NUI.Sets whether or not SHUTDOWN_LOADING_SCREEN automatically shuts down the NUI frame for the loading screen. If this is enabled,
you will have to manually invoke SHUTDOWN_LOADING_SCREEN_NUI whenever you want to hide the NUI loading screen.
